scripts.lint: prettier --check . && astro check && eslint "src/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,astro}" && stylelint "**/*.{css,astro}" --report-needless-disables --report-invalid-scope-disables && (html-validate "src/**/*.html" || true) && markdownlint "**/*.md" "**/*.mdx"
scripts.fix: prettier --write . && astro check && eslint --fix "src/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,astro}" && stylelint "**/*.{css,astro}" --fix --report-needless-disables --report-invalid-scope-disables && (html-validate "src/**/*.html" || true) && markdownlint --fix "**/*.md" "**/*.mdx"
scripts.test: npm run build && npx playwright test
scripts.test:a11y: npm run build && npx playwright test tests/accessibility.spec.ts
scripts.test:perf: npm run build && npx playwright test tests/performance.spec.ts
scripts.test:seo: npm run build && npx playwright test tests/seo.spec.ts
scripts.test:lighthouse: npm run build && npx lhci autorun
scripts.test:all: npm run build && npm run test:lighthouse && npx playwright test
scripts.test:ci: npm run build && npx playwright test --project=chromium-light --project=chromium-dark
